headline: SSD, RAM, and performance tuning that lasts.
description: Speed up your computer in {{city_upper}} with SSD and RAM upgrades, thermal servicing, and performance tuning. Extend the life of your hardware with practical improvements.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Replacing a hard drive with an SSD dramatically improves boot and app load times, even on older PCs.
Insufficient RAM forces constant disk swapping, which makes systems feel slow under normal workloads.
Dust buildup and dried thermal paste lead to thermal throttling. Cleaning and re-pasting restore lost performance.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We upgrade and optimize PCs and laptops to deliver faster performance, better reliability, and longer lifespan. Whether you need more speed for everyday tasks or extra power for demanding workloads, we handle every step from parts sourcing to installation.

Our process includes thorough diagnostics, careful installation of components, and post-upgrade testing to ensure stability. We use quality parts, proper thermal management, and firmware updates to give you results that last.

sections.heading: Popular Upgrades
paragraph: Targeted upgrades deliver big gains for daily use, gaming, and work, often for less than replacing the device.
items: Thermal paste refresh and dust cleaning

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We evaluate your system, recommend the best-value upgrades, and handle parts, installation, and testing. You get a faster, quieter machine and a clear report of what changed.
